spec.name: password_entry
spec.label: Please enter the password provided by your local health district to access this form.

spec.name: ownership
spec.label: 1. Is the UOCC under the same ownership as it was during the last inspection?

spec.name: new_owner
spec.label: Has the new owner applied to be a UOCC?

spec.name: provide_application
spec.label: Please provide them with a UOCC application.

spec.name: sign
spec.label: 2. Does the UOCC have a collection sign clearly posted at the main entrance?

spec.name: provide_sign
spec.label: Please provide a sign and have the UOCC post it where it can be seen by the public.

spec.name: qr_system
spec.label: 3. Is the UOCC using the QR Code program to log used oil?

spec.name: explain_qr_system
spec.label: Please explain the QR Code system, present the UOCC Training Video, provide a QR Code flyer from Google Drive, then request DWMRC assistance.

spec.name: verification
spec.label: 4. Does the UOCC verify used oil being poured into the tank(s)?

spec.name: orphan_oil
spec.label: 5. Is orphan oil being recorded correctly? (Using the QR Code system)

spec.name: uocc_type
spec.label: 6. Does the UOCC accept used oil only from acceptable generators? (Type A: DIYers; Type B: DIYers/farmers; Type C: DIYers/farmers/businesses; Type D: businesses)

spec.name: contamination
spec.label: 7. Does the UOCC reject contaminated used oil?

spec.name: contamination_usedoil
spec.label: 7a. If solvents, hazardous waste, or other substances are mixed with used oil, does the UOCC know what to do with contaminated used oil?

spec.name: dwmrc_assist_disposal
spec.label: Please request DWMRC assistance at the end of this form (select the 'request assistance' option on the last page) for disposal options.

spec.name: transportation
spec.label: 8. Does the UOCC use a Utah permitted used oil transporter to ship used oil off-site?

spec.name: transportation_no
spec.label: Please provide a current list of used oil transporters permitted by the State. If the UOCC is self-transporting used oil, include additional information (e.g. own vehicles, to an aggregation point, etc.)

spec.name: records
spec.label: 9. Does the UOCC keep shipping and collection records for 3 years, even if self-transporting? (e.g. electronic or paper)

spec.name: spill_plan
spec.label: 10. Is the Emergency Spill Plan posted near the used oil storage area?

spec.name: spill_plan_employees
spec.label: 10a. Do UOCC employees know what to do in case of a used oil spill?

spec.name: spill_plan_copy
spec.label: Please provide a copy of the DWMRC template Emergency Spill Plan .

spec.name: spill_materials
spec.label: 11. Are spill cleanup materials easily accessible to employees? (e.g. close to used oil storage area)

spec.name: spills
spec.label: 12. Is the UOCC free from signs of used oil spills? (e.g. large stains on floors and/or soil)

spec.name: tank_condition
spec.label: 13. Are used oil tank(s) and container(s) in good condition, not leaking, and closed during storage except when adding/removing used oil? (e.g. funnels closed or removed after use)

spec.name: labels
spec.label: 14. Are used oil tank(s) and container(s) clearly labeled or marked with the words "Used Oil"?

spec.name: tank_security
spec.label: 15. Are tank(s)/container(s) secured from the public? (e.g. locked funnel, inside locked fence or building)

spec.name: access_tanks
spec.label: 16. Is access to tank(s) clutter free? It should be safe and easy to pour used oil into tank(s) and accessible to emergency personnel.

spec.name: containers
spec.label: 17. Is used oil transferred into the tank(s) immediately?

spec.name: containers_good_condition
spec.label: 17a. If not, are container(s) in good condition, closed, labeled "Used Oil" and stored in secondary containment?

spec.name: secondary_containment
spec.label: 18. If applicable, is secondary containment free from used oil, water and debris? (e.g. single-walled tanks)

spec.name: filters
spec.label: 19. Does the UOCC collect used oil filters?

spec.name: drain_method
spec.label: 19a. Are these filters punctured, crushed or dismantled, and gravity hot-drained? (at least 12 hours at >60° F)

spec.name: on_site_burning
spec.label: 20. If the UOCC burns used oil (self-generated, DIYer, and farmer), does it comply with the on-site burning requirements?

spec.name: on_site_burning_businesses
spec.label: 20a. If the UOCC burns used oil from businesses (UOCC Types C and D), is the used oil certified as on-specification by a registered Used Oil Marketer?

spec.name: photos
spec.label: 21. When applicable, were photos taken of any compliance issues? (e.g. storage tank/areas, spills, no spill material/container)

spec.name: photos_please_upload
spec.label: Please attach any and all photos from the inspection to the bottom of this page.

spec.name: other_issues
spec.label: 22. Describe any other UOCC or used oil generator non-compliance issues that need to be addressed.

spec.name: note_assistance
spec.label: Once you have submitted this form, an automated email will be sent to representatives at DWMRC. You will be contacted via your employee email.

spec.name: signature
spec.label: By typing my name below, I certify the information in this form submission is true and correct.

parameters.name: handleErrors
parameters.label: Evaluate all states as errors (except for 2xx and 3xx )

expect.name: shareCookies
expect.label: Share cookies with other HTTP modules

from.name: Utah Division of Waste Management and Radiation Control

mapper.subject: UOCC Inspection Report
mapper.content_value: Attached is the Used Oil Collection Center inspection report for {{1.feature.attributes.select_the_facility}} ({{1.feature.attributes.id_}}) completed on {{37.value}}. {{newline}}{{newline}}Do not respond to this email. If you need assistance, please contact the Division of Waste Management and Radiation Control, Used Oil and Outreach Program at 801-536-0200. Or, visit our website at UsedOil.utah.gov

mapper.subject: UOCC Inspection: Request for Assistance
mapper.content_value: {{1.feature.attributes.inspectorname}} ({{1.feature.attributes.employee_email}}) at {{1.feature.attributes.lhd}}  requested assistance during the inspection of {{1.feature.attributes.select_the_facility}} ({{1.feature.attributes.id_}}) on {{37.value}}. Their report is attached.
